mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_credentials_pending (user_id, credential_type, secret_hash, salt, status, retry_count, next_retry_at, last_error, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{credentialType}, #{secretHash}, #{salt}, #{status}, #{retryCount}, #{nextRetryAt}, #{lastError}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, credential_type, secret_hash, salt, status, retry_count, next_retry_at, last_error, created_at, updated_at FROM auth_credentials_pending WHERE status = #{status} AND (next_retry_at IS NULL OR next_retry_at <= #{now}) ORDER BY updated_at ASC LIMIT #{limit}
